com.badlogic.gdx.backends.gwt

Class GwtApplicationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.gwt.GwtApplicationConfiguration

  • public class GwtApplicationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean alpha
      whether to include an alpha channel in the color buffer to combine the color buffer with the rest of the webpage effectively allows transparent backgrounds in GWT, at a performance cost.

      whether to enable antialiasing

      the id of a canvas element to be used as the drawing area, can be null in which case a Panel and Canvas are added to the body element of the DOM

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GwtApplicationConfiguration()
      Creates configuration for a resizable application, using available browser window space minus padding (see padVertical, padHorizontal).
      GwtApplicationConfiguration(boolean usePhysicalPixels)
      Creates configuration for a resizable application, using available browser window space minus padding (see padVertical, padHorizontal).
      GwtApplicationConfiguration(int width, int height)
      Creates configuration for a fixed size application
      GwtApplicationConfiguration(int width, int height, boolean usePhysicalPixels)
      Creates configuration for a fixed size application Also see usePhysicalPixels documentation.

    • Field Detail

      • disableAudio

        public boolean disableAudio
        If true, audio backend will not be used. This means Application.getAudio() returns null.

      • width

        public final int width
        the width of the drawing area in pixels, or 0 for using the available space

      • height

        public final int height
        the height of the drawing area in pixels, or 0 for using the available space

      • padHorizontal

        public int padHorizontal
        Padding to use for resizing the game content in the browser window, for resizable applications only. Defaults to 10. The padding is necessary to prevent the browser from showing scrollbars. This can happen if the game content is of the same size than the browser window. The padding is given in logical pixels, not affected by usePhysicalPixels.

      • padVertical

        public int padVertical
        Padding to use for resizing the game content in the browser window, for resizable applications only. Defaults to 10. The padding is necessary to prevent the browser from showing scrollbars. This can happen if the game content is of the same size than the browser window. The padding is given in logical pixels, not affected by usePhysicalPixels.

      • stencil

        public boolean stencil
        whether to use a stencil buffer

      • antialiasing

        public boolean antialiasing
        whether to enable antialiasing

      • rootPanel

        public Panel rootPanel
        the Panel to add the WebGL canvas to, can be null in which case a Panel is added automatically to the body element of the DOM

      • canvasId

        public java.lang.String canvasId
        the id of a canvas element to be used as the drawing area, can be null in which case a Panel and Canvas are added to the body element of the DOM

      • usePhysicalPixels

        public final boolean usePhysicalPixels
        Whether to use physical device pixels or CSS pixels for scaling the canvas. Makes a difference on mobile devices and HDPI and Retina displays. Set to true for resizable and fullscreen games on mobile devices and for Desktops if you want to use the full resolution of HDPI/Retina displays.
        Setting to false mostly makes sense for fixed-size games or non-mobile games expecting performance issues on huge resolutions. If you target mobiles and desktops, consider using physical device pixels on mobile devices only by using the return value of GwtApplication.isMobileDevice() .

      • log

        public TextArea log
        a TextArea to log messages to, can be null in which case a TextArea will be added to the body element of the DOM.

      • useDebugGL

        public boolean useDebugGL
        whether to use debugging mode for OpenGL calls. Errors will result in a RuntimeException being thrown.

      • preserveDrawingBuffer

        public boolean preserveDrawingBuffer
        preserve the back buffer, needed if you fetch a screenshot via canvas#toDataUrl, may have performance impact

      • alpha

        public boolean alpha
        whether to include an alpha channel in the color buffer to combine the color buffer with the rest of the webpage effectively allows transparent backgrounds in GWT, at a performance cost.

      • premultipliedAlpha

        public boolean premultipliedAlpha
        whether to use premultipliedalpha, may have performance impact

      • fullscreenOrientation

        public OrientationLockType fullscreenOrientation
        screen-orientation to attempt locking as the application enters full-screen-mode. Note that on mobile browsers, full-screen mode can typically only be entered on a user gesture (click, tap, key-stroke)

      • openURLInNewWindow

        public boolean openURLInNewWindow

      • useAccelerometer

        public boolean useAccelerometer
        whether to use the accelerometer. default: true

      • useGyroscope

        public boolean useGyroscope
        whether to use the gyroscope. default: false

    • Constructor Detail

      • GwtApplicationConfiguration

        public GwtApplicationConfiguration()
        Creates configuration for a resizable application, using available browser window space minus padding (see padVertical, padHorizontal).

      • GwtApplicationConfiguration

        public GwtApplicationConfiguration(boolean usePhysicalPixels)
        Creates configuration for a resizable application, using available browser window space minus padding (see padVertical, padHorizontal). Also see usePhysicalPixels documentation.

      • GwtApplicationConfiguration

        public GwtApplicationConfiguration(int width,
                                   int height)
        Creates configuration for a fixed size application

      • GwtApplicationConfiguration

        public GwtApplicationConfiguration(int width,
                                   int height,
                                   boolean usePhysicalPixels)
        Creates configuration for a fixed size application Also see usePhysicalPixels documentation.

      • isFixedSizeApplication

        public boolean isFixedSizeApplication()
